content.value:
Lockdown starts Thursday 

If it lifts on schedule, businesses will have just 8 working days to implement and train new software, systems and permits to handle whatever post-Brexit trading arrangements the govt agrees

Govt cannot currently describe those arrangements 

8 days
content.html: Lockdown starts Thursday If it lifts on schedule, businesses will have just 8 working days to implement and train new software, systems and permits to handle whatever post-Brexit trading arrangements the govt agrees Govt cannot currently describe those arrangements 8 days
